makeup.title: Make-up Knowledge
makeup.description:
The purpose of makeup:
1. To boost confidence
2. To hide imperfections on the face
3. To emphasize natural beauty
4. To enhance appearance for specific events
5. To express creativity and art

This makeup knowledge contains a complete guide on the right techniques for various conditions and needs.

knowledgeDetails.title: Make-up Details
knowledgeDetails.description: Klik pada kartu di bawah untuk melihat informasi detail

emptyState.title: Tidak Ada Make-up Ditemukan
emptyState.description: Kami tidak dapat menemukan item make-up yang cocok dengan pencarian Anda.
